ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have yet to be killed in Kith except for one time when I zoned in from RV into a train so i zoned back, only to fall for 10k of damage. Ive done 3 solo body
ygData.messageBody:
I have yet to be killed in Kith except for one time when I zoned in from RV
into a train so i zoned back, only to fall for 10k of damage. Ive done 3 solo
body recoveries for people that have taken me pretty deep into the wood, I
did 2 at night, and was never once attacked. We have it alot easier than some
do.
Heres some of my strategies for living.
1) Selo's of course
2) Have Guardian rhythems memmed. When i play this with a regular drum my MR
jumps to 80 something or other.
3) Have invis memmed too. Not everything there can see invis
4) As most have said stay on the wall.
5) Don't be so afraid of the place!!! If you go in expecting to die, you are
most likely gonna.

People need to just get over it; Kith is now a high level zone now. Take
precautions and there is no need for all this whining.

Renaldo Rallentando 34th string
